    Upgrade guideline

    When detecting the upgrade information, please upgrade as follows:

    1. Login via ssh or VNC management terminal VM, switch to the root account, or sudo privileges.
    2. Close flexgw, execute the command: /etc/init.d/flexgw stop
    3. Upgrade, execute the command: /usr/local/flexgw/scripts/update --yes
    4. follow the prompts to finish the Upgrade.
    5. The upgrade is complete, start flexgw: /etc/init.d/flexgw start

    Note: Before you upgrade, we recommend to backup files in /usr/local/flexgw/instance/
